```{r}
Bootstrap_estimates<-replicate(5,{
bootstrap_samples <- startups[sample(1:nrow(startups),nrow(startups),replace = T),]
bootstrap_models <- lm(Profit~R.D.Spend, data = bootstrap_samples)
coef(bootstrap_models)
})
```
